message:
Dear {{ doc.passenger_name }},

We would like to inform you that the gate number for your upcoming flight {{ doc.flight }} has been updated to Gate {{ doc.gate_number }}.

Please arrive at the gate in advance to ensure a smooth boarding process.

Flight Details:

  • Departure Date: {{ doc.departure_date }}
  • Departure Time: {{ doc.departure_time }}

For any assistance, feel free to reach out to our support team.

Best Regards,

SkyTrack Airport Management System

Email: skytrack.management.system@gmail.com
name: gate changed!
subject: Gate Change Notification for Your {{doc.flight}}
